articles.content: Zynga(NASDAQ:ZNGA) published a press release on June 11 detailing a publishing partnership with Snap(NYSE:SNAP) that will bring new games to the social media company's Snapchat social-media platform.… [+1650 chars]

articles.title: Destiny 2’s Trials of Osiris disabled for unknown amount of time - Polygon
articles.description: On June 12, players discovered for The Lighthouse in Destiny 2. Bungie has since disabled the Trials of Osiris game mode, and it’s currently unclear when it will come back
